medium: Black chalk, pen, and dark brown ink; brush and wash; squared in black chalk; framing lines in pen and brown ink; laid down
title: Rest on the Flight into Egypt
marks:
Inscription

LLC, in black chalk (or graphite?):
description: Mary seated at right, holding baby Jesus on her PR knee; Joseph stands at left, pointing to Jesus, with his PR arm raised, PR foot resting on a rock; adoring man, LRC, and angels at right and top; squared off into a grid
